title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 223.7 - Determined violation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 223.7 - Determined violation

State Regulations
A contravention of this Part shall be deemed to be an unfair method of competition or an unfair or deceptive act and practice in the conduct of the business of insurance in this state, and shall be deemed to be a trade practice constituting a determined violation, as defined in section
2402 (c)
of the Insurance Law, in violation of section 2403 of such law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
223.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
